评论详情: These pants are cheap, and light and perfect for vacation travel. I'm 5'2" and have issues finding pants that don't drag, these are the perfect length! They are thin and lightweight. Perfect for backpacking type vacation to tropical climates.
Cheap material, very thin and falling apart.
Let me soft material, but way way too thin if you’re not wearing a long tunic over it forget about it

评论概述: Very comfortable and pockets are great
评论详情: I have three similar pants. I like these pants for comfort, fabric, patterns, and pockets. I may buy another pair.

评论概述: Just what I was looking for
评论详情: Love the fabric and fit, true to size
The pants are cute and fit right but the listing says they're made of rayon but when I got them I could tell they weren't. I looked at the tag and it say it's 100% Viscose.

I love elephants, so I HAD to have these when I saw them.  They are very lightweight and work better for the summertime, but fortunately I just went on a cruise and got the chance to wear them.  I think they can easily be worn casually, but it’s also not hard to dress them up a bit, so I love that versatility.  The waist is elasticy and very comfortable.  I could lounge around in these as easily as go out in them.  I got an XL and they were true to size.

评论概述: Soft, Stretchy and comfy fit for Mom
评论详情: LOFBAZ Women Flowy Palazzo Wide Leg Pants fit as expected for Mom. She loves the stylish look ( frilly waistband), comfy and soft fit and stretchy waist ( very stretchy) to assure a snug fit no matter what. Deep enough pockets for mom's hands. She loves it, recommends it!

These pants are strictly for loungewear. The fabric is sheer enough to see my skin color beneath. Also, the fabric ripped across the back of the leg after 2 washes and at the waistband after 1 wash. They are not appropriate for any activity beyond leisurely strolling.

类型: Size: XX-Large PlusColor: Mandala Flower White
评论详情: The material is light and flowing. The colors and design are very pleasing. The legs fit well and the length was fine. The issue I had was the “natural waist” where the elastic was… When you bend or sit, the “muffin top” is below the elastic, if that makes sense. Not only is this unflattering it’s very uncomfortable and cuts off circulation. The crotch sits way low (5 inches below inseam) and if you try to pull them up, they get tight in the buttocks and leaves and unfortunate from view… I really wanted to like these, but they are not made right. They did wash well and the wrinkles came out by hanging them. If the measurements were more “normal” these could have been great!
This pants feel nice and comfortable.  They look great, just like the pictures.  They are very lightweight and loose.  No complaints so far.

I got these to wear as a swimsuit bottom coverup.  They are so cute and comfy, I may wear them all the time.  They are sheer, so make sure you have appropriate undergarments, especially if you get white!I am only 5'3" so finding pants like these that don't drag on the ground is hard.  These are the perfect length for me.  As you can see from the photo they fall right at my ankles.  They also have a stretchy waist that holds in place well but also offers lots of stretch.  You can easily pull them up higher on your waist for "capri" style or bring them down if you like them more on your hips.The material is "100% Viscose" which is another name for Rayon (based on a quick Google search).  They are soft and silky feeling.  I absolutely love these and I think the price is very fair.
They feel nice but the shrinkage make these more like capris than pants. I'm 5'5" and they sit just below my calves. They are comfortable but a strange length after washing.

评论概述: Nice for the beach or pool
评论详情: These beige smocked, wide leg women’s pants have been made of very thin, almost sheer material. They do not look like they do on the model photos. As you can see in my last photo, the black and white clothes and my skin all can be seen through the material in low level, indoor lighting, no flash on camera. The pants themselves have been made fairly well, with mostly neat stitching and few loose threads. Highlight- The pants have pockets! Generous pockets! They are a good fit, true to size. The elastic waistband makes these comfortable pants to wear in any situation. They are very lightweight material making them great for around the house, pool or at the beach but given the beige are see through, it makes them inappropriate to wear anywhere else unfortunately. I really wanted to love these pants but they’re just not what I was expecting. If you’re looking for a cover up type of pants then these would be good, if you’re looking for more everyday pants then go with something made from a thicker or less sheer material.

评论概述: Fit as expected, because I sized one up
评论详情: Based on other reviews, I decided to order an XL as opposed to my usual L, and for that I am eternally gratefully. The waist still fits properly, but most importantly, the sizing up gives the appropriate breezy loose feel one would be seeking in a palazzo pant, and the perfect length as well. Absolutely stunning pants!
They were smaller than expected. Palazzo pants are supposed to be loose, flowy, and terribly comfortable, aren't they? These pants are none of those things.

I love these pants. They are so comfortable! I am 5'2 and the length is just right. They are perfect for the south Florida heat. Great beach weather pants! I am very happy with the quality, color and comfort.
This pair of pants fits me perfectly. It looks stylish and feels soft and comfortable. I like the two-pockets.

Love how airy and light these pants are. They are perfect for summer or even late spring wear. I did get the all white pair and they are VERY see through. So make sure you wear white underwear or a thong with it. It washed up very nicely. Didn’t shrink or have the fabric wither at all. Over all, would purchase another set of these pants in a heartbeat.

I LOVE these pants!  They are so soft, incredibly cool to the touch, and ultra lightweight without being see through. The size chart says that the XL size should fit a waist of 32-35" and that is correct.  These fit me perfectly, are ultra comfortable at the waist, but do not fall down.  I would not consider going up or down a size.  These pants have pockets, which you don't often find in this style.  You can dress these up or just wear them for lounging.  They have a finish that is neither shiny nor opaque, but rather egg shell like.  I wish these were offered in more solid colors, as I am not enthusiastic about the prints.
These are cut weird so they cut across the stomach when you bend over. In addition to that, the material is see through. Definitely do not recommend.

Nice, comfortable wide leg pants. I like the soft, shuttle print. Comfortable for work, a trip to the farmers market or just lounging around. Nice fit, soft material, not too much stretch. I went a size larger and the fit is good.
These are the cutest, most comfy pants! I want to order four more pair! They can go from lounging around, to running errands to date night, of you dress them up. So versatile and so comfortable. Win!

评论概述: perfect for summer, very breezy and light
评论详情: These make good loungewear, too, but they are perfect for wearing out and about in the heat of summer...very airy and light and breathable. The smocked waistband has a lot of give. I ordered the black, and there's no see-through issues, would imagine that white or light colors would have some transparency issues, given the light weight of the fabric. I'm 5'10" and the legs reach the bottom of my ankle, look great with sandals or flip-flops.

These palazzo pants are so incredibly comfortable. The top is a stretchy material that is higher waisted, so it fits perfectly for any size body. The wide leg pants are flowy and flattering. The black material is super soft and lightweight for any season (but not seethrough). I only wish they had more colors (instead of prints) because I would buy more!

These are so comfortable! They are airy and lightweight. The band stretches nicely and comfortably.  I will say that I think it shrank a little in the wash.  They seem shorter in length after washing. Overall, I am pretty happy with my purchase.

Overall these are good pants they fit good because they do stretch material does seem like more of a beach pool cover up in a pair of pants but that’s what I’m using them for, so I definitely like them they are pure white and the material is kind of thing keep that in mind, but overall they fit good and they look good one so I would recommend them

Super see through. I had planned on wearing these to work, but that's gonna be a big NO. Happened to catch the light as I was taking them out of the bag and basically was able to see right through them. They are very comfortable and light weight. Will make a great pair of lounging pants, maybe good with a bathing suite for walking around. The length is gonna be an issue for some, I think. I am 5'6 and these hit right at the ankle. Any taller and I'm thinking highwaters for some folks. The rouching is comfy and not itchy at all, which is great.

My oldest daughter wears almost nothing but Palazzo pants. These are a great addition to her wardrobe. She's a size 2 and 5'9" (very tall and slim). These fit her great and aren't too short on her, which is great. The quality definitely isn't top end, but they are comfortable and while they likely won't stand the test of time, they look great on my daughter and she loves them. Overall, as long as you understand that these lean toward fast fashion than they do high-end fashion, they will likely meet or exceed your expectations.

评论概述: Lightweight and comfy, an inch too short
评论详情: These are almost the perfect summer pants for me: they are super comfortable (extra stretchy waistband), lightweight (probably if they were any other color than black they'd be see-through) and versatile, but I am 5'9" and I could have used one more inch in the length of the legs.

I love these lounge pants!  They are super lightweight and flowy, with wide legs, and a thick but comfortable waist band.  They even have pockets, which is a must these days!  They are really great for wearing around the house, and when I work from home nobody can tell they are comfy lounge pants.  They fit as expected, and do not cause any sensory discomfort.
I like this beach long and wide pants. This is perfect to wear in the beach or around the house. It is very lightweight and see through. It's beautiful.
